sentence.Network_en: She displays none of the sanctimoniousness often associated with spirituality.
sentence.Network_cn: 在她身上丝毫未见圣职人员常有的那种故作虔诚。

假装的英文|假装是什么意思... ... 假装虔诚 ： Pietism 假装虔诚 ： sanctimoniousness 假装祈祷 ： and i pretend to pray.

list.abs: a sickening sanctimonious smile ., 令人作呕的伪装神圣的笑容.
uncelestial worldly carnal corporal secular humane假神圣 sanctimonious sanctified过分注重细节的、挑剔的、拘于礼节的 meticulous nitpick finicky.
You do not have to be so sanctimonious to prove that you are devout ., 您不必如此伪善 , 证明你是虔诚的.
Please , spare me any sanctimonious injunctions about her chosen way of life ., 请 , 饶了我对她选择的生活方式任何冠冕堂皇的禁令.

entry.def: If you say that someone is sanctimonious, you disapprove of them because you think that they are trying to appear morally better than other people.

example.tran: 他写的都是些自我陶醉、故作清高的垃圾作品。
你这个道貌岸然的伪君子！

means.word_mean: 1. the quality of being hypocritically devout
